title.rendered: Air Mauritius Reservation Office in London, United Kingdom

content.rendered:
Air Mauritius Ltd was established in 1967, commenced its operations on August 1972.It is the flag carrier airline of Mauritius which is headquartered at the Air Mauritius Centre in Port Louis, Mauritius. Its main hub is Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam International Airport.
Air Mauritius is the fourth largest carrier in Sub-Saharan Africa and has an important standing in the European, African, and Indian Ocean region markets.

 

 

Air Mauritius London, United Kingdom Address:
AIR MAURITIUS(Town Office)
Ground Floor Suite
Chiswick Place
272 Gunnersbury Avenue
London W4 5QB

Air Mauritius United Kingdom telephone contact numbers:
Internet Sales/Telephone Sales & General Enquiries
Tel: 0207 434 4375 or Tel: 0207 660 0062 Administration & Trade Enquiries
Tel: 0208 834 5800 (Monday to Friday 0900-1730)

Email: Internet Sales/Telephone Sales & General Enquiries Email : reservations_mru@airmauritius.com
Administration Enquiries email : UKInformation@airmauritius.com
Trade Enquiries email : UKReservations@airmauritius.com
Complaints & Feedback on a recent flight
Contact our Customer Relations at airmauritius@airlinecrm.com

Working hours
(Monday to Sunday -24 hours- 00h00-23h59)

Map: View direction here

Air Mauritius Official website: http://www.hongkongairlines.com/

Air Mauritius Online Check-in: www.hongkongairlines.com/online check-in

Air Mauritius Check-in timing

www.hongkongairlines.com/check-in timing

Check Air Mauritius schedule here: www.hongkongairlines.com/flight schedule

Check Air Mauritius flight status here: www.hongkongairlines.com/flight status

Air Mauritius baggage services telephone contact numbers:

Air Mauritius Baggage Allowance

Air Mauritius Baggage

View Air Mauritius Hand | Cabin baggage, Checked baggage, Excess baggage charges, over weight baggage charges, over size baggage charges in the above link.

Near-by Airports:

Near-by cities:

Attractions in London:

Types of Planes / Air craft available with Air Mauritius

Total fleet: 13

  • Airbus A319-100
  • Airbus A330-200
  • Airbus A340-300
  • Airbus A350-900
  • ATR 72-500

Queries handled by Air Mauritius Customer care:

Flight Ticket Booking, Ticket Cancellation, Flight Ticket Rescheduling, Ok to Board, Visa Services, Online Check-in, Baggage Allowance, Duty Free Allowance, Flight Information, Airport Lounges, Visa Information, In-Flight Meals, Airport Transfers, Missing Luggage, Immigration Services, Valet Parking, Meet and Greet, Flight Wifi, Airport Wifi, In-Flight Entertainment, Airport Facilities, Delayed Flights, Visa on Arrival, First Class, Business Class, Economy Class, Kestrelflyer

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Air Mauritius London Reservation Office Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Air Mauritius London Reservation Office in United Kingdom: (click on the stars below)
